events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I would like to return it.
The customer's issue was reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product received.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case and assist the customer further.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
In order to start the refund process, I need your order number and a brief description of the reason for the return.
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived last week but the material quality is not as described on the website, so I want to return it for a refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. Please ship the product back using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the product back by the end of the week.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and to ask if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As the refund has been completed successfully and the customer is satisfied, we are closing this support case. Thank you.
